text: 9.12 Dan 9.24, Hib 9.26, 10.4, 1 Pi 1.19 Pen Klays ne kal agnɨgep ñɨluk mɨgan ayaŋ suŋtep ke yɨbɨl ak amnɨg, chag meme chag bulmakaw ñɨluk pakɨl, nɨkɨm dɨl God nop sɨbog ñɨnɨm agɨl ma amnak. Nɨkɨm ne ke ak dɨl, God nop sɨbog ñɨnɨg amɨl, mɨnek nokom yɨbɨl dad kal ñɨluk mɨgan ayaŋ suŋtep ke yɨbɨl ak amnak. Amek nɨm, chɨnop gɨñɨl anɨgɨl dek, pel pelnep yonɨgabun.
